ygData.subject: Re: Isn't this a monk mailing list?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am guess I am guilty of leting myself get dragged into teh TWINKING debate.  Emotions sometimse run high and I wanted to defend my point of view taht
ygData.messageBody:
I am guess I am guilty of leting myself get dragged into teh TWINKING
debate. Emotions sometimse run high and I wanted to defend my point of
view taht Twinking is a personal choice regaurdless of wether you yourself
support twinking or not.
Anyway, I agree the twinking debate has gotten old so I will IGNORE any
further posts on the subject no matter how they irritate me.

P.S. 500p is a reasonable amount to have SAVED up by level 18, but making
500p IN ONE DAY at level 19 is amazing, he may not wnat to give away his
secret, but what ever he is doing to make that kind of money I would like
to know...

On Mon, 20 Sep 1999, Scott Hueseman wrote:

> From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
> >From: Dave Kuehn <dwkuehn@...>
> >
> >I didn't sign up to hear people bitch and moan about twinking and spell
> >nerfing. While I'm not positive, I would think that most of you didn't
> >sign up to hear about it either.
>
> Here, here. If I wanted to hear whining and ranting, I'd go read EQVault
> message boards. I liked the stories, questions and roleplaying stuff I
> heard when I first joined the list.
>
> Anyway, does anyone think the new silk armor is pretty cool for low-mid
> level monks? Sure, it makes woven outdated, but it definitely makes
> tailoring a viable trade skill again. I hope someday it ends up being
> like jewelry is now. Ah, it only took verant six months to add the
> remaining tailor patterns. Maybe smiths will be able to craft other armor
> and weapons next!
>
> Oh, and on the subject of what is an appropriate amount of money for a level
> 19 monk (someone posted they had 500pp at that level): I had 200pp saved up
> at level 18, and I really didn't try to make money. Certain areas
> (gargoyle isle, beholder) are very very profitable. Had I been trying to
> amass wealth, I could have easily had 500pp by now.
>
> Dornn, Level 18 Silent Fist, Brell Serilis server
>
> >
